ohloh.description:
Designed primarily for the Beaglebone Black, but also capable of running on any system with Debian Jessie installed, the FreedomBone allows you to self-host a variety of useful web services with a reasonable degree of security and privacy.

Services include encrypted email, social networking via Red Matrix, Owncloud, encrypted IRC, wiki and blog.
ohloh.name: FreedomBone

description: [FreedomBone](https://github.com/bashrc/freedombone) Designed primarily for the Beaglebone Black, but also capable of running on any system with Debian Jessie installed, the FreedomBone allows you to self-host a variety of useful web services with a reasonable degree of security and privacy.
name: FreedomBone
